definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
lit. late-comer lives above (idiom); the up-and-coming youngster outstrips the older generation/the pupil surpasses the master

sentences.english: So the chemo finished. Then, blood began to appear in the patient's urine.
sentences.chinese: 后来，化疗结束以后，病人出现了血尿。

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行动导致被判处死刑，后来减为有期徒刑。

sentences.english: Subsequently to Button as it stood to install heat sink .
sentences.chinese: 后来又照原样把扣具安装回散热片。

sentences.english: Please come back to renew your passbook or get your money in seven days.
sentences.chinese: 七天后来补领新存折，也可以提现金。

sentences.english: Then I realised it was me.
sentences.chinese: 后来我知道，那就是我自己。

sentences.english: Marie-Thérèse was also the mother of his son Claude, and his daughter Paloma.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽后来又生了儿子克劳德和女儿帕露玛。

sentences.english: He died on the way to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 后来他还是死在了去医院的路上。

sentences.english: My fatherwon the game. Then I played Scrabble.
in later years, they'd come and go.
sentences.chinese: 后来几年，就算有朋友，也都来去匆匆。

sentences.english: I was recruited to play intercollegiate basketball and became a professional player.
sentences.chinese: 开始打的是大学篮球，后来成为了一名职业球员。

sentences.english: The kingdom was conquered by the Mongol and Chinese armies of Kublai Khan.
sentences.chinese: 大理王国后来被忽必烈率领的蒙汉联军击败。

sentences.english: And then you come to the end of the story and I don't love any more.
sentences.chinese: 后来你走了风停了故事也结束了我也不会再爱了。

sentences.english: The kingdom was conquered by the Mongol and Chinese armies of Kublai Khan .
sentences.chinese: 大理王国后来被忽必烈率领的蒙古族和汉族军队攻破。

sentences.english: Later, Gongxing Lun at the beginning of a long self-study and examination, a full 7 years.
sentences.chinese: 后来，龚兴伦开头了漫长的自学和考试，整整7年。

sentences.english: Later she scored a few guest-starring roles.
sentences.chinese: 后来她又得到了一些客串的角色。

definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
